## Noteworthy Features:

## Supported Compilers
The code will work on the following compilers:
- GCC (latest)
- Clang (latest)
- Apple clang (version 11.0.0 or later)

## Library Dependencies
- `<kspc/kspc.hpp>` → depends on no library
- `<kspc/integration.hpp>` → `GSL`
- `<kspc/linalg.hpp>` → `BLAS`, `LAPACK`
